hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} .
csvcut -c 1,2,3,8,9 Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
cat inputs.csv cd pic-sure-metadata-curation IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]]; then if [ ${abv_name,,} == "red_coral" ]; then aws s3 cp redcoral/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json" elif [[ ${stdy_type,,} != "parent" ]] && [[ ${stdy_type,,} != "topmed" ]] && [[ ${stdy_type,,} != "substudy" ]]; then if compgen -G "${abv_name,,}/output/${abv_name,,}_metadata.json" > /dev/null; then echo "Metadata found for ${abv_name,,}" aws s3 rm s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json" aws s3 cp ${abv_name,,}/output/${abv_name,,}_metadata.json s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/${abv_name,,}_metadata.json elif [ ${abv_name,,} == "recover_pediatric" ]; then #TODO - wont be necessary when we move to direct from hpds population of variables echo "${abv_name} has an alternative metadata curation method" else echo "Metadata not found for ${abv_name}. Please check directories and try again" echo "$abv_name $stdy_id" >> missing_metadata.txt exit 255 fi fi else echo "$stdy_id not ready for processing and/or is compliant. Skipping." fi done < inputs.csv
aws s3 cp dcc_harmonized/output/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/hrmn/metadata/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json"
